original_text: And the Lord turned the captivity of Job, when he prayed for his friends: also the Lord gave Job twice as much as he had before.
korean_text: 욥이 그의 친구들을 위하여 기도할 때 여호와께서 욥의 곤경을 돌이키시고 여호와께서 욥에게 이전 모든 소유보다 갑절이나 주신지라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord turned the captivity of Job
when he prayed for his friends
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 친구들을 위하여 기도할 때에

sentences.original_text: also the Lord gave Job twice as much
sentences.korean_translation: 여호와께서 또한 욥에게 두 배를 주셨으니
